âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Draws plots directly in the terminal â€¢ Supports bar, histogram, line, scatter, density, and box plots â€¢ Processes data from standard input (piped data) â€¢ Handles CSV and TSV data formats â€¢ Configurable plot dimensions and titles
ðŸ“– Summary: YouPlot is a command-line tool written in Ruby that generates various types of plots directly within the terminal. It leverages UnicodePlot to render visualizations from data piped into it, supporting formats like TSV and CSV.
